-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("ZoneSceneManagerComponentAwakeSystem", function (namespace)
    local Awake
    Awake = function (this, self)
      ET.ZoneSceneManagerComponent.Instance = self
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AwakeSystem_1(out.ET.ZoneSceneManagerComponent)
        }
      end,
      Awake = Awake,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          class = { 0x6, out.ET.ObjectSystemAttribute() }
        }
      end
    }
  end)

  namespace.class("ZoneSceneManagerComponentDestroySystem", function (namespace)
    local Destroy
    Destroy = function (this, self)
      self.ZoneScenes:Clear()
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.DestroySystem_1(out.ET.ZoneSceneManagerComponent)
        }
      end,
      Destroy = Destroy,
      __metadata__ = function (out)
        return {
          class = { 0x6, out.ET.ObjectSystemAttribute() }
        }
      end
    }
  end)

  namespace.class("ZoneSceneManagerComponentSystem", function (namespace)
    local ZoneScene, Add, Get, Remove
    ZoneScene = function (entity)
      return Get(ET.ZoneSceneManagerComponent.Instance, ET.SceneHelper.DomainZone(entity))
    end
    Add = function (self, zoneScene)
      self.ZoneScenes:AddKeyValue(zoneScene.Zone, zoneScene)
    end
    Get = function (self, zone)
      local _, scene = self.ZoneScenes:TryGetValue(zone)
      return scene
    end
    Remove = function (self, zone)
      self.ZoneScenes:RemoveKey(zone)
    end
    return {
      ZoneScene = ZoneScene,
      Add = Add,
      Get = Get,
      Remove = Remove
    }
  end)
end)
